```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(olsrr, ggstatsplot, ggpubr, 
               sf, spdep, GWmodel, tmap,
               tidyverse, gtsummary, performance,
               see, sfdep)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale = read_csv("data/aspatial/Condo_resale_2015.csv")
glimpse(condo_resale)
```

:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#conversion using best guess.
condo_resale_sf <- st_as_sf(condo_resale,
                            coords = c("LONGITUDE", "LATITUDE"),
                            crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs=3414)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggcorrmat(condo_resale[, 5:23])
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In_Class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=1152}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_mlr <- lm(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + 
                  AGE   + PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + 
                  PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + 
                  PROX_HAWKER_MARKET    + PROX_KINDERGARTEN + 
                  PROX_MRT  + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + 
                  PROX_TOP_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + 
                  PROX_SUPERMARKET + PROX_BUS_STOP + 
                  NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + 
                  FREEHOLD + LEASEHOLD_99YR, 
                data=condo_resale_sf)
summary(condo_mlr)
```

:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_fw_mlr <- ols_step_forward_p(
  condo_mlr,
  p_val = 0.05,
  details = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(condo_fw_mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In_Class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggcoefstats(condo_mlr,
            sort = "ascending")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In_Class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=1152}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_plot_resid_fit(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In_Class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_plot_resid_hist(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In_Class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_test_normality(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
-----------------------------------------------
       Test             Statistic       pvalue  
-----------------------------------------------
Shapiro-Wilk              0.6856         0.0000 
Kolmogorov-Smirnov        0.1366         0.0000 
Cramer-von Mises         121.0768        0.0000 
Anderson-Darling         67.9551         0.0000 
-----------------------------------------------
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mlr_output <- as.data.frame(condo_fw_mlr$model$residuals) %>%
  rename(`FW_MLR_RES` = `condo_fw_mlr$model$residuals`)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale_sf <- cbind(condo_resale_sf, 
                        mlr_output$FW_MLR_RES) %>%
  rename(`MLR_RES` = `mlr_output.FW_MLR_RES`)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(mpsz)+
  tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE) +
  tm_polygons(alpha = 0.4) +
tm_shape(condo_resale_sf) +  
  tm_dots(col = "MLR_RES",
          alpha = 0.6,
          style="quantile")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In_Class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale_sf <- condo_resale_sf %>%
  mutate(nb = st_knn(geometry, k=6,
                     longlat = FALSE),
         wt = st_weights(nb,
                         style = "W"),
         .before = 1)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_moran_perm(condo_resale_sf$MLR_RES, 
                  condo_resale_sf$nb, 
                  condo_resale_sf$wt, 
                  alternative = "two.sided", 
                  nsim = 99)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Monte-Carlo simulation of Moran I

data:  x 
weights: listw  
number of simulations + 1: 100 

statistic = 0.32254, observed rank = 100, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: two.sided
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_fixed <- bw.gwr(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE + 
                     PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + 
                     PROX_ELDERLYCARE   + PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + 
                     PROX_MRT   + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + 
                     PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_BUS_STOP + 
                     NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD, 
                   data=condo_resale_sf, 
                   approach="CV", 
                   kernel="gaussian", 
                   adaptive=FALSE, 
                   longlat=FALSE)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_fixed <- gwr.basic(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + 
                         AGE    + PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + 
                         PROX_ELDERLYCARE   +PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + 
                         PROX_MRT   + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH +
                         PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_BUS_STOP + 
                         NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD, 
                       data=condo_resale_sf, 
                       bw=bw_fixed, 
                       kernel = 'gaussian', 
                       longlat = FALSE)
```

gwr_fixed

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_adaptive <- bw.gwr(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE  + 
                        PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + PROX_ELDERLYCARE    + 
                        PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + 
                        PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL   + PROX_BUS_STOP + 
                        NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD, 
                      data=condo_resale_sf, 
                      approach="CV", 
                      kernel="gaussian", 
                      adaptive=TRUE, 
                      longlat=FALSE)
```

                            PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE + PROX_ELDERLYCARE + 
                            PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK +

  tm_polygons(alpha = 0.1) +
tm_shape(gwr_sf_adaptive) +  
  tm_dots(col = "AREA_SQM_SE",
          border.col = "gray60",

  tm_dots(col = "AREA_SQM_TV",
